alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Crow Wing and Aitkin Counties. For the Mississippi at Aitkin Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, A few homes become surrounded by water in the Cedarbrook neighborhood near Eagle Rd. The Aitkin city park becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 15.5 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.6 feet on 04/27/1974. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 100 PM CDT.
